name: Bagel and cream
title: This vegan-friendly version swaps eggs for protein-packed chickpeas, and makes enough for four.

name: Breakfast sandwich
title: You can make these in the oven or on the grill in just about 20 minutes — and thanks to the foil, cleanup is a total breeze.

name: Baked Chiken
title: This budget-friendly version takes pantry staples — like black beans and canned corn — and roasts everything on a sheet pan.

name: Eggs BEnedict
title: Better than takeout — and better for you, too. For extra protein and fiber, swap in soba noodles.

name: Toast Croissant Fried
title: The easy sauce — which includes soy sauce, garlic, and ginger — comes together quickly and packs a ton of flavor.

name: Fried Egg Toast Brunch
title: Just make sure you are draining your salmon very well before mixing it together with your patty ingredients, or else your patty might be a little hard to shape.
